director.name: María Paz González María Paz González

introduction: Cruz is an actress who has dedicated her career to play different roles for medicalstudents in college. She is a simulated patient who performs emotions and ailmentsin front of young doctors who are confronted to unknown realities for them.One night, while she is jogging in the gym inside the building where she lives, Cruzwitnesses a body falling from above. But instead of helping the victim, she keepsjogging. Her lack of reaction is recorded by a security camera, and is later questionedby the police. Unable to explain what happened and confronted by the unexpecteddeath of an unknown person, Cruz realizes how herlife seems to have been disconnected from all natural impulses, doubting about her reactions, her job and above all, her own affections.
